title: Crown Moldings, Soothing Spa, EV Chargers
posting_body: ['Welcome to gracious living in the grand European tradition in the heart of upbeat, downtown Los Angeles, offering skyline views of one of Americas most dynamic cities.', 'Eleven distinctive floor plans that were creatively designed and crafted with a wealth of detail giving you the perfect setting for your luxurious California lifestyle.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', '-Generous Walk-In Closets with Organizers', '-Italian Marble Bath Vanities', '-Panoramic Skyline City Vistas or Courtyard Views', '-Eight (Category 5 Speed) Phone Line Capability', '-Light, Airy Interiors with Nine Foot Ceilings', '-Private Balconies or Patios', '-Den/Study*', '-Large Picture Windows', '-Custom & Trimmed Camden Interior Doors', '-Clear Glass Shower Enclosures', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '-Spectacular Two-Story Entry Lobby', '-Additional Monthly Parking Available', '-Soothing Spa', '-24-Hour Doorman', '-Yoga/Dance Studio with Large Flat-Screen TV and DVD Player', '-24-hour Library/Study Room with High Speed Internet Access', '-Conference/Board Room for Meetings (Seats 8 Comfortably)', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool', '-Gorgeous Water Fountains in Every Courtyard', '-Barbecue Area with 3 Grills', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '1221 W. 3rd St., Los Angeles, CA 90017', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
